democracy sausage with mark kenny covid 19 and how to flatten the curve

ANDS-Grants.description: The proposed project is a system change within partner emergency departments, providing them the information and tools to act on both risky alcohol consumption in individual patients and the sources of alcohol in the community which cause the harm they experience. Most importantly, the proposed public health interventions act as a tool for emergency departments to regularly raise awareness with the public and policymakers regarding the impact of alcohol on patients, clinicians and hospitals.
ANDS-Grants.title: Driving Change: Using Emergency Department Data To Reduce Alcohol-related Harm
funder: National Health and Medical Research Council
subjects: Public Health and Health Services not elsewhere classified
